# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} "Half [[Fuzhou]] dialect and half [[Mandarin]]", i.e. Fuzhou dialect spoken by a non-native, or Standard Mandarin spoken by a native Fuzhounese.
#: {{zh-x|我 福州儂 講 普通話，半鹹淡 會 乞 汝 笑。|Please excuse my poor Mandarin level; I am Fuzhounese and my Mandarin is '''non-standard'''.|MD|tr=nguāi Hók-ciŭ-nè̤ng gōng pū-tŭng-uâ, buáng-gèng-dâng â̤ ké̤ṳk nṳ̄ chiéu.}}
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} A person who speaks nonstandard Fuzhou dialect or Mandarin.
